== Main Inclusion Report for ndisgtk ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' <nowiki>[[http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/n/ndisgtk/]]</nowiki>; available for i386 and amd64
# ''Rationale:''
** Allows the user to configure ndiswrapper in a graphical way
** Should be included in the default image
** This tool is widely used, popcon report 21526 installations (ndiswrapper has ~28000 installations)
** A step forward to https://blueprints.edge.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+spec/easy-ndiswrapper
 0. ''Security:''
** /usr/sbin/ndisgtk runs as root
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** I develop this software and maintain it in <nowiki>[[http://packages.qa.debian.org/n/ndisgtk.html|Debian]]</nowiki> and Ubuntu
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>: Should be.
** <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki> compliance: Yes
** Uses debhelper
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** python
** ndiswrapper-utils-1.9
** python-gtk2
** python-glade2
 0. ''Background information:''
** Initially developed by Sam Pohlenz, taken over by JulianAndresKlode
